oracles-usage: Oracles can be used for Curators or as a requirement to create Distributions in the Network

lock.label: Lock
lock.title: Lock $BEPRO
lock.body: You are locking /bepro{{amount}} $BEPRO /br/ to get /oracles{{amount}} Oracles

unlock.label: Unlock
unlock.title: Unlock $BEPRO
unlock.body: Give away /oracles{{amount}} Oracles/ /br/ to get back /bepro{{amount}} $BEPRO

delegate.label: Delegate
delegate.title: Delegate Oracles
delegate.description: Delegate Oracles to use them in bounties

errors.amount-greater: Amount is greater than your {{amount}} amount
errors.amount-higher-0: $BEPRO amount needs to be higher than 0.
errors.self-delegate: You can't delegate Oracles to your own address.
errors.approve-transactions: Please approve BEPRO Transactions First. Check it and try again.
